message: Let's start with a fair deal. I'll take 90% and you get 10%, but we can negotiate.
You wanted to start with a fair deal, but you took 90%! I'll give you a fair deal now. 60-40 split, no more, no less.
Okay, I'll compromise a bit. Let's split it 55-45,  giving you a little more than before. This way, we both get a better share.
You're still trying to take the majority, but I'm not giving in. I'll give you a bit more, but I'm taking a larger share this time. 70-30 split, take it or leave it.
Let's be reasonable. We're both losing money with each round. I'm willing to take a smaller share to avoid getting nothing at all. Let's split it 45-55.
